Summary: I witnessed a sphere like object in my backyard w/ interaction involved
trends: There has been one other sighting in Roy
There were no other sightings in Roy on or around August 24th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 12:30 am and I woke up thirsty I went to our kitchen to get a drink of water.A window looks out the back at the sink wich faces a set of trees and back pasture as I looked out the window I was admiring the large full moon through the trees when it dawned on me that we had just had a full moon the week befre so as I looked closer I realized it was slowly moving through the trees I was very excited and ran to wake up my boyfriend who was sleeping on the couch at the time.He got up and looked out proceeded to tell me it was a helicopter in the short amount of time it took me to reach him and return to the window no more than 20 feet there and back it was over our house we have a round circular turn around in our yard with trees in the middle maybe 10 trees in a small cluster where you can go around to get out of our yard anyway I could see this totally silent craft hovering above with multi colored lights on it.I just stood there watching this thing for the next half hourand suddenly I just went to bed.This is where things get crazy in the morning I woke up after having wild realistic dream of 3 aliens (grays )by my bed then going up in ufo then nothing.I honestly thought it was just a dream but when I got to work that morning I was not feeling right my face felt puffy like sunburn and I never go out in sun because I work inside all day and it felt like a red hot poker had been stuffed up my nose and my left ear hurt later when I got home I inserted Q-tip in my left ear which had blood on itI kept that Q-tip for the longest time just for proof to myself. Also when I took a bath that night my whole body stung when I got in the hot water and for a couple weeks after and when I put my hands in cold water it literely felt like my skin was peeling off and my skin would welt up where the water hit it like acid or something and last of all my hair started turning gray more like white at 38yrs old never had it before I have new white hair growth out the side of my head that was facing object its now 5 inches long mixed in with my real hair very strange.I dont understand what happened but without a doubt something did and now im afraid they are goung to come back someday to take back what ever they put in me.I want to go be hypnotized but maybe not rembering everything is my bodies way of dealing with the trauma.I wish I had someone to talk to I feel alone.
